roleset.name: look down upon, dislike
roleset.note: DISDAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disdain' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.2-1, Framenet entry Judgement. (from disdain.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boring
example.text: [The old guard]-1 had every right, however , [*]-1 to disdain the newcomers' new ways of making money, such as greenmail.
example.arg: the newcomers' new ways of making money, such as greenmail
